name: Sniper War Mission
description:
Get ready to accept your mission and destroy the enemy's headquarters. Careful action, carefully looking for enemies hiding in the jungle. Do not fire easily until you are ready because your gunshots will draw the enemy's attention. The enemy will attack you. You must ensure your own safety so that you can accomplish your mission.

Features:
- high-quality 3D graphics
- real battlefield environment
- Test your shooting ability
- a variety of powerful weapons
- challenging mission
- Amazing music and sound effects
- Simple and smooth control
- Play games anytime, anywhere
